title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn Enterprise edition on or off
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn Enterprise edition on or off
This page describes how to turn [Enterprise edition](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/about-advanced-features#enterprise-features) on or off for a search app.
Enterprise Edition is only available for search apps. You can't turn off Enterprise edition for apps that are connected to a website data store.
content:
## Before you begin
If you're turning on Enterprise edition features, be aware of additional costs that this can incur. See [Pricing](/generative-ai-app-builder/pricing) .
Make sure that any app for which you turn off Enterprise edition doesn't require Enterprise edition features. After turning Enterprise edition off, all features that require Enterprise edition stop working in your app within a few minutes.
Features that require Enterprise edition include:
- Website search (both Standard and Enterprise editions)
- [Extractive answers](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/snippets#extractive-answers) .
- [Extractive segments](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/snippets#extractive-segments) .## Turn Enterprise edition on or off
To turn Enterprise edition on or off, follow these steps:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **Search and Conversation** page. [Search and Conversation](https://console.cloud.google.com/gen-app-builder/engines) 
- Click the name of the app for which you want to turn Enterprise edition features on or off.
- In the navigation menu, click **Configurations** .
- Click the **Advanced** tab.
- In the **Enterprise edition features** pane, click the toggle on or off.
- Click **Save** . Your changes take place within a few minutes.
